      • begin

        public boolean begin(com.fazecast.jSerialComm.SerialPort serialCom)
        Stablish a serial connection.
        Parameters:
        serialCom - A JSerialComm object to serial communication.
        Returns:
        True if the serial connection was stablished or false if not.

      • end

        public void end()
        Close the serial connection.

      • sendError

        public void sendError(int deviceID,
                      int errorCode)
        Send a CEP packet (Communication Error Packet).
        Parameters:
        deviceID - Id of the target device in communication.
        errorCode - The communication error code.

      • readPacket

        public AMASPSerial.PacketData readPacket()
        Check if a valid packet is available and read it.
        Returns:
        A PacketData Object which contains the information and data from a packet.

      • LRC

        protected int LRC(byte[] data,
                  int dataLength)
        Calculates the LRC (Longitudinal Reduncancy Check).
        Parameters:
        data - Bytes to calculate the LRC.
        dataLength - Data length.
        Returns:
        the calculated LRC.
